title: Review: The Black Keys-Tighten Up
content:
At their best The Black Keys are the pioneers of modern blues, at their worst simply derivative throwbacks to a kinder era. Thankfully their new single ‘Tighten Up’ falls under the former, seeing them return to form. The sound is remarkably cleaner, gone is the typical Black Keys gravel, in its place is a more soulful groove filled sound. Dan Auerbach’s voice as always is agonisingly passionate and moulds perfectly with the new direction. Although a new direction for the band ‘Tighten Up’ is by no means revolutionary, however the catchy and of course passionate sound will still have you tapping your foot.

Download Tighten Up
